html: Today, I used an airhorn to demonstrate how disruptive seismic airgun blasting is to marine life. It was LOUD. Now imagine that sound 16,000x louder, repeated every 10 seconds for months, when you depend on sound to communicate/navigate. That's what seismic airgun blasting does.pic.twitter.com/1uBPyHVWu3

text:
Tonight, we are holding a hearing to ask the VA and other federal agencies how we can work together to combat this crisis. If you or a loved one are in crisis, call 1-800-273-8255. 

We haven't been doing enough to #BeThere for veterans but together we can change that.

html: Every single person who played a role in the fight against offshore drilling deserves a round of applause. But this fight is by no means over. We need legislation to permanently protect our coastal communities from the threat of offshore drilling. Congress must pass my bill.
text: Every single person who played a role in the fight against offshore drilling deserves a round of applause. But this fight is by no means over. We need legislation to permanently protect our coastal communities from the threat of offshore drilling. Congress must pass my bill.

html: And NOW, Interior Secretary Bernhardt announced that - in part because of the ongoing litigation and clear opposition by elected officials - the Administration was indefinitely postponing their plans to expand offshore oil and gas drilling. This is great news!
text: And NOW, Interior Secretary Bernhardt announced that - in part because of the ongoing litigation and clear opposition by elected officials - the Administration was indefinitely postponing their plans to expand offshore oil and gas drilling. This is great news!

html: Last month, the courts got involved as well. A federal judge ruled that Trump did not have the authority to overturn a ban on offshore drilling in the Arctic and parts of the Atlantic.
text: Last month, the courts got involved as well. A federal judge ruled that Trump did not have the authority to overturn a ban on offshore drilling in the Arctic and parts of the Atlantic.

html: We made it clear that opposition to offshore drilling was NOT a partisan issue. We all know that our coastlines are too valuable to our economy, environment, and way of life to jeopardize because when you drill, you spill. And even a small oil spill would devastate our community.
text: We made it clear that opposition to offshore drilling was NOT a partisan issue. We all know that our coastlines are too valuable to our economy, environment, and way of life to jeopardize because when you drill, you spill. And even a small oil spill would devastate our community.

html: On my 4th day in office, I introduced a bill that would place a ten-year ban on oil and gas leasing. Last month, I introduced a bill that would permanently ban oil and gas drilling on the Atlantic and Pacific coasts - both with bipartisan support.
text: On my 4th day in office, I introduced a bill that would place a ten-year ban on oil and gas leasing. Last month, I introduced a bill that would permanently ban oil and gas drilling on the Atlantic and Pacific coasts - both with bipartisan support.

html: The reaction from the Lowcountry and coastal communities across the country was immediate. While running for office, I promised I would say hell no to offshore drilling. My opponent... not so much.
text: The reaction from the Lowcountry and coastal communities across the country was immediate. While running for office, I promised I would say hell no to offshore drilling. My opponent... not so much.

html: I just heard reports that the Trump Adminstration was halting its plans to expand offshore drilling in the Atlantic. How did we get here and what does this mean? In January of 2018, the Interior Dept announced its intention to open up the Atlantic and Pacific to offshore drilling
text: I just heard reports that the Trump Adminstration was halting its plans to expand offshore drilling in the Atlantic. How did we get here and what does this mean? In January of 2018, the Interior Dept announced its intention to open up the Atlantic and Pacific to offshore drilling

South Carolina is one of 30 where LGBTQ people are at risk of being fired, evicted or denied services just because of who they are. That's unacceptable.

html: Today @RepPeteKing, @RepCunningham, and I introduced legislation that closes the “Charleston Loophole” in gun background checks. Let’s prevent tragedies like the Emanuel massacre by closing the loophole and ensuring background checks are completed before a gun is sold.
text:
Today @RepPeteKing, @RepCunningham, and I introduced legislation that closes the “Charleston Loophole” in gun background checks.
 
Let’s prevent tragedies like the Emanuel massacre by closing the loophole and ensuring background checks are completed before a gun is sold.

html: The House has passed 8 bills that would reopen government and the Senate has refused to vote on any of them. It’s time for the Senate to do its job and pass a bill to end this shutdown so we can get to work on a real immigration solution.
text: The House has passed 8 bills that would reopen government and the Senate has refused to vote on any of them. It’s time for the Senate to do its job and pass a bill to end this shutdown so we can get to work on a real immigration solution.

html: Since most marine life depend on sound to communicate/navigate, blasts can disrupt basic survival functions. Noise from just ONE airgun can kill off zooplankton, the organism that underpins the entire marine food chain.
text: Since most marine life depend on sound to communicate/navigate, blasts can disrupt basic survival functions. Noise from just ONE airgun can kill off zooplankton, the organism that underpins the entire marine food chain.

html: Blasts need to be loud enough to travel the miles between the ocean floor and a ship - which means they can be heard underwater from about the distance between LA and NYC!
text: Blasts need to be loud enough to travel the miles between the ocean floor and a ship - which means they can be heard underwater from about the distance between LA and NYC!

html: But even before you get to the drilling stage, companies must search for oil and gas deposits buried deep under the ocean floor thru a process called seismic airgun blasting. This is an extremely loud and disruptive process.
